backgrounds.prompt: Scene: A sunny forest clearing featuring three wooden stumps serving as a podium. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache illustration, whimsical children's book aesthetic. Atmosphere: Cheerful and bright with colorful bunting flags hanging between trees in the background. Composition: Wide angle, center area kept spacious and empty for text/gameplay, no characters, soft dappled sunlight.

Scene: A close-up, top-down view of a smooth, flat wooden table surface. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache texture, soft organic wood grain. Atmosphere: Warm and focused, with soft diagonal stripes of sunlight cast across the wood. Composition: Clean empty canvas for placing objects, blurred forest background at very edges.

Scene: A bamboo shelving unit leaning against a large sturdy tree trunk. Art Style: Hand-painted watercolor and gouache, organic lines. Atmosphere: Organized yet rustic forest setting. Composition: The shelves are empty (ready for items), framing the scene naturally, soft ambient forest lighting.

character_sprites.prompt: Character: A cute Giraffe teacher. Action: Smiling comfortably and looking at the viewer. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache, soft brushstrokes. Setting: Isolated on PURE WHITE background with a clean white die-cut border. Quality: High-resolution raster illustration.

Character: A cute Giraffe teacher. Action: Gesturing with one hoof as if explaining a concept, mouth slightly open. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache. Setting: Isolated on PURE WHITE background with a clean white die-cut border.

Character: A cute Giraffe teacher. Action: Hoof near chin, looking thoughtful or quizzical. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache. Setting: Isolated on PURE WHITE background with a clean white die-cut border.
Character: A cute Giraffe teacher. Action: Eyes wide open, looking amazed. Art Style: Hand-painted digital gouache. Setting: Isolated on PURE WHITE background with a clean white die-cut border.
